name: Large Leather and Fabric Clutch
description:

- Antique brass hardware
- Colorful lining made from preloved material
- Fits A4 paper

Approximate measurements

Height - 10 inches or 25.4 cm
Depth - 1 inch or 2.5 cm

* Each Mina + Oli bag is one-of-a-kind, made from re-purposed materials that are given new life once again.  Silhouettes may be the same, but each bag will have its own unique details that are often inspired by the original leather garment it was made from. Since the materials are preloved, sometimes an aged look is expected. This adds to the bag’s charm and adds that wonderful soft worn in feel to the leather.

MADE IN AUSTRALIA

FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!
